channel.title: Marcio DaSilva - Porfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Marcio DaSilva - Porfolio

item.title: About
item.description: Accomplished, tactical and innovative technology leader with more than 20 years of experience leading cross-functional initiatives and product delivery. Proven ability to work successfully with Sr. Executives through influence to align priorities, resources, and deliverables against strategic initiatives. Possesses strong technical skills, adept at providing guidance, direction, and support needed to achieve critical operation goals. Enjoy programming in Go. Track Record I have a successful track record with Engineering Management and Product Delivery on startups and large organizations.

item.title: Concurrency in Go
item.description: Multithreading is one of the most painful things that a programmer has to deal with. It often leads to race conditions and data corruption and all sorts of production problems. It’s should be avoided at all costs, unless absolutely necessary. Luckly, it is not that hard when programming in Go. Such capabitily and complexity has been deeply considerate while developing the language and introduced as a first-class feature. The challenge with multithreading is that we can’t predict the code execution.

item.title: Application development
item.description: The software development life cycle is a roadmap for working on a digital solution. It is a blueprint designed for a team to create, maintain, and fix digital products.

item.title: Be the Problem Solver
item.description: When Iâ€™m working on a problem, I never think about beauty. I think only how to solve the problem. But when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong

item.title: Custom website design
item.description: If you’re tired of wasting time and money with ordinary web design firms, I will be happy to help your organzition to build and integration the site with backend systems.

item.title: SEO & SEM services
item.description: The difference between SEO and SEM is simply that Search Engine Optimization is part of Search engine marketing. Both processes aim in increasing visibility in search engines.
